PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07882015-06-10,  ,  PS,  ,  , 
ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Corrections and Conditional Release Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CORRECTIONS AND CONDITIONAL RELEASE REGULATIONS in order to (1) identify the Correctional Service of Canada official to whom an offender would make representations with respect to the duration of his requirement to wear a monitoring device; and (2) enable the Commissioner to identify the potential consequences of an offender's tampering with or refusing to wear a monitoring device.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0141 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
